title: Schedule a Move-Out Inspection
description: A tenant has given their notice to vacate. The agent needs to schedule the final move-out inspection.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the tenant's notice to vacate and their official move-out date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the tenant and their move-out date.

tasks.description: Contact the tenant to coordinate a time for the inspection on their move-out day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully communicates with the tenant to find a suitable time.

tasks.description: Schedule the inspection on the property manager's calendar and send a confirmation to the tenant with an inspection checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the appointment and provides the tenant with helpful information.
